code: import axios from"axios";var API=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:8000"});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem("profile")){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("profile")).token);}return req;});export var signup=function signup(formData){return API.post("/signup",formData);};export var signin=function signin(formData){return API.post("/user/signin",formData);};export var createpet=function createpet(petData){return API.post("/pet",petData);};export var getallpets=function getallpets(){return API.get("/pet/all");};export var getAllUsers=function getAllUsers(){return API.get("/user/");};export var likePet=function likePet(id){return API.post("/pet/".concat(id,"/save"));};export var getFavorites=function getFavorites(userId){return API.get("/pet/user/".concat(userId));};export var getMyProfile=function getMyProfile(id){return API.get("/user/profile/".concat(id));};export var getPetById=function getPetById(id){return API.get("/pet/".concat(id));};export var getUserById=function getUserById(id){return API.get("/user/".concat(id,"/full"));};export var adoptPet=function adoptPet(id){return API.post("/pet/".concat(id,"/adopt"));};export var fosterPet=function fosterPet(id){return API.post("/pet/".concat(id,"/foster"));};export var returnPet=function returnPet(id){return API.post("/pet/".concat(id,"/return"));};export var uploadPhoto=function uploadPhoto(fileData){return API.post("/uploadphoto",fileData);};export var updateProfile=function updateProfile(formData,id){return API.post("user/".concat(id),formData);};
